GEO usage citations

This page lists third-party publications that cite GEO data as evidence to support or complement independent studies,
or use GEO data as the basis of statistical/analytical hypotheses or tools.
Please report omitted publications to geo@ncbi.nlm.nih.gov.

Also, see list of publications that cite deposit of data in GEO.


Total number of citations: 618
Last updated: December 17 2009
